LanguageData.OE_BattlecraftPump.label: obsidia battlecraft pump
LanguageData.OE_BattlecraftPump.description: This device enhances the combat stats of a deathresting person by chemical stimulation of nervous system. It must be connected to a deathrest casket to function.\n\nThis building needs to consume hemogen to function.
LanguageData.OE_PerfectioningPump.label: obsidia perfectioning pump
LanguageData.OE_PerfectioningPump.description: This device enhances the working stats of a deathresting person by chemical stimulation of nervous system. It must be connected to a deathrest casket to function.\n\nThis building needs to consume hemogen to function.
